home.title: Description
home.content:
Welcome to my web site.

My name is Jérôme Lanteri and i'm french dev freelance. This web site is build with Express.js backend simple framework and React.js frontend framework.

I can also build other backend code with Ruby (Rails-5 framework) or Python-3 (Flask or Django-3 framework). I can link them as you want with any ORM database (MySQL/MariaDB, Postgresql, MongoDB).

I can install your web site on a remote server for you on Nginx http server
